description: Perfect for kids and adults alike, the whole family will love these fresh, flavourful and nutritionally approved chicken san choy bow.
name: Chicken San Choy Bow Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small Lebanese cucumber, cut into matchsticks
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch spring onions, green and white parts separated, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vinegar and syrup in a medium bowl. Add carrot and cucumber, then toss to combine. Set aside to pickle for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions. Drain and roughly chop.

Heat oil in a large frying pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add mince, mushroom and white part of spring onion, then stir-fry for 5 minutes or until chicken and mushrooms are golden and cooked through. Remove pan from heat, then add noodles and toss to combine. Season with pepper.
Spoon chicken mix into lettuce cups and serve topped with pickled carrot and cucumber, and green part of spring onion.
